comment.author: 45586426@N06
comment._content: Close in color picture of airborne A-3B Skywarrior. The small serial number on lower rear fuselage may be read as 147656 KA-3B Skywarrior 147656 VAQ-130 DET 4 USS RANGER Modex 610 on nose Some notes; A3D-2 Skywarrior 147656 Originally built as A3D-2 Accepted By US Navy July 1960 Became A-3B from 1962 May 1967. Converted by NARF Alameda to EKA-3B. Nov. 1974 converted to KA-3B. Assigned to VAQ-308 later VAK-308. 1961 picture of A3D-2 147656: geta-o.maxs.jp/USMIL/A/A-3/A-3B/A-3B.htm geta-o.maxs.jp/USMIL/A/A-3/A-3B/147656(NG6)A-3B-0040.jpg VAH-6. Modex 6. Tail code NG. 1961.11.03/ATSUGI (3 March 1961 over NAF Atsugi, Japan) In 1968 EKA-3B 147656 was aboard CVA-66 USS AMERICA as Modex 716, later 016 with VAW-13 DET.66 with CVW-6 (code AE): www.gonavy.jp/CVW6-AE1968.html This was before or between April 10 & Dec.16, 1968 (Vietnam War deployment) Then in 1969 EKA-3B 147656 joined VAQ-133 as Modex 615 to sail with CVW-14 (code NK) aboard CVA-64 USS CONSTELLATION www.gonavy.jp/CVW14-NK1969.html before or between Aug.11, 1969 & May 8, 1970 (another Vietnam War assignment) Here’s a pictures and a record of EKA-3B 147656 as Modex 615 with VAQ-130 DET 3 dated 24 Aug 1971: www.vaq34.com/a3list/147656.jpg geta-o.maxs.jp/USMIL/A/A-3/EKA-3B/EKA-3B.htm geta-o.maxs.jp/USMIL/A/A-3/EKA-3B/147656(NM615)EKA-3B-087... VAQ-130 DET-3 147656/NM615 1971.08.24/ATSUGI Note tail code NM of CVW-19. This was when embarked on CVA-34 USS ORISKANY between May 14 & Dec.18, 1971 (again in support of the Vietnam War) www.gonavy.jp/CVW19-NM1971.html Relating to the above ‘flickr’ pic, VAQ-130 DET 4 using Modex codes starting with 610 is recorded here: www.gonavy.jp/CV-CV61f.html as being aboard CVA-61 USS RANGER some time between May 7 & Oct.18 1974 for a WestPac voyage. This was as part of CVW-2 code NE.. So the picture is approximately dated year 1974. 1976 picture of now KA-3B 147656 with VAQ-308. Stylised Tail code ND. Modex 636 www.alamedanavalairmuseum.org/Units/Aircraft/VAK-308.aspx taken on 14 July 1976 --provided by Mr. Robert M. Cieri. 1977 picture of KA-3B 147656: www.gonavy.jp/bbs1/index.cgi?page:160=v www.gonavy.jp/bbs2-a3.html KA-3B 147656. VAQ-308. Stylised Tail code ND. Modex 634. Dated May 28 1977. Over NAF Atsugi, Japan. 1977 reference to KA-3B 147656: seagull77.web.infoseek.co.jp/IwakuniH/ih.html “May 30 5 VAQ-308 EKA-3B (ND634/147656)” On May 30 1977 - EKA-3B 147656 of VAQ-308 as Modex 634, was sighted flying over MCAS base Iwakuni. Japan. (after use of a translation facility) It appears the aircraft retained the same markings as ND Modex 634 for many years: www.cloud9photography.us/Military-Aviation-10/Douglas-KA-... Douglas KA-3B Skywarrior #147656 VAK-308 Alameda 1985 by Peter J Mancus These ‘flickr’ pics show KA-3B 147656 near the end of its career: www.flickr.com/photos/rv8tor/4807284937/ www.flickr.com/photos/rv8tor/4807907100/ KA-3B 147656 at NAS Moffett Field air show VAQ-308 website with picture of KA-3B 147656: skywarrior.cool.ne.jp/vaq-308sub.htm 1985 pictures of KA-3B 147656: www.airfighters.com/photo/47065/M/USA-Navy/Douglas-KA-3B-... KA-3B (147656) ND/634 VAK-308 NAS Oceana Sept, 1985. David F Brown. www.aircraftprofiles.dk/wp-content/gallery/vak-308-griffi... A KA-3B of VAK-308 "Griffins" (147656) on Sept 14th, 1985 (Photo; Paul Minert collection) (Very many thanks and credit to Takafumi Hiroe of Japan for all ‘GO!NAVY’ references) This comprehensive AMARC Inventory listing for 2nd December 1998 does not record KA-3B 147656: f4phantom.co.uk/tucson/amarc.txt KA-3B 147656 is not recorded in the MASDC & AMARC Database - Douglas A-3 Skywarrior www.amarcexperience.com/AMARCDB.asp?SessionId=826193756&a... www.amarcexperience.com/AMARCDB.asp?SessionId=534092316&a... Its fate is unknown. Although by year 2010 it will have long been scrapped, perhaps at a Naval Air Station.
